Name: ZeroGravityCylinder
Notes: A gravity area that attracts objects towards collision triangles. This variant uses a cylindrical range and ignores the Range setting.

Obj_arg0.Name: Base Distance
Obj_arg0.Description: The minimum distance used for calculating the gravity speed. Default is 2000.

SW_A.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is not activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
